price: “Sε woka nokwafoͻ no ho ampa a, adεn nti na womma soro abͻfoͻ mma yεn hͻ?”
arabic: لَّوۡمَا تَأۡتِينَا بِٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ ٱلصَّٰدِقِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: law mā tatīnā bil-malāikati in kunta mina al-ṣādiqīna
